alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 6:04PM MST until February 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills are expected with readings as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and east central and northeast Colorado. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing and dress in layers.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
